html:
When it comes to building a portfolio, one of the toughest challenges is narrowing down your images—what makes the cut and what gets left behind?

In their new class, Rick Sammon sits down with Scott to do exactly that. They start with 75 of Rick’s photos and work their way down to just 24 final selects for his portfolio. Along the way, they share their thought process, what they look for in a strong image, and why consistency and variety both matter when you’re putting your best work out into the world. It’s part photo critique, part portfolio strategy, and full of helpful takeaways you can use when building or updating your portfolio.

Watch the quick video below to hear Rick and Scott explain what the class is all about—and then go check it out here!
